code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:pt presents with moderate wheezing x 7 weeks. pt also complains of moderate sob, moderate shortness of breath. she is a 40 yo f director. o:Height 154 cm, Weight 94.3 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 73, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17, NAD, Pulm: Wheezing on ausc RUL LUL; CTA Bil LL field, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, skin: well-perfused, HEENT: WNL, O2 Sat: 96% RA, Mild distress in pt w/ dyspnea when talking, CTA-LR, wheeze-RU a:Asthma p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Prednisone - 20 mg orally, and ordered FEV1, FEV1/VFC, PEF, Pulse Oximetry.

content2.Unmatched: on ausc RUL LUL; CTA Bil LL field , Heart = RRR , Normal S

Term.SOAP_SECTION: head, eyes, ears, nose, throat Examination

Value.Value: ordered FEV 1 , FEV 1/VFC , PEF , Pulse Oximetry

content2.Value: ordered FEV 1 , FEV 1/VFC , PEF , Pulse Oximetry

td.content: s:a 41 year old F director with C/O moderate wheezing that worsens in cold air, mild cough and moderate breathlessness during exercise. o:Height 153 cm, Weight 90.7 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 73, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15, nose = no nasal congestion, NAD, normocephalic/atraumatic (nc/at), Pulm: mild LLL wheeze o/w cta-b, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, HEENT: WNL, CTA-LL, wheeze-LU, PERRL, A&O x 3, wheeze-BIL, Chest: RRR, No M/G/R a:Asthma p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Albuterol ("rescue inhaler") - 2.5 mg as needed for SOB, and ordered Arterial Blood Gas.

content2.Unmatched: o/w cta - b , Heart = RRR , Normal S

Term.SOAP_SECTION: head, eyes, ears, nose, throat Examination
